data.Sentence: --- lesson 143  A walk through the woods

data.Sentence_cn: 我住在一个由美丽的树林环绕的古老小镇上。
data.Sentence: I live in a very old town which is surrounded by beautiful woods.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是一个著名的风景胜地。
data.Sentence: It is a famous beauty spot.

data.Sentence_cn: 每适星期天，有许许多人从城里来观赏我们的小镇，并在树林中散步。
data.Sentence: On Sundays, hundreds of people come from the city to see our town and to walk through the woods.

data.Sentence_cn: 游客已被告知要保持树林的整洁。
data.Sentence: Visitors have been asked to keep the woods clean and tidy.

data.Sentence_cn: 树下都已设置了废物筐，
data.Sentence: Litter baskets have been placed under the trees,

data.Sentence_cn: 但是人们仍到处扔垃圾。
data.Sentence: but people still throw their rubbish everywhere.

data.Sentence_cn: 上星期三我到树林里去散步。
data.Sentence: Last Wednesday, I went for a walk in the woods.

data.Sentence_cn: 我所见到的一切使我非常难过。
data.Sentence: What I saw made me very sad.

data.Sentence_cn: 我数了一下，有7辆旧汽车和3上旧冰箱。
data.Sentence: I counted seven old cars and three old refrigerators.

data.Sentence_cn: 而满地都是纸片、烟头、旧轮胎，空瓶子和生锈的空罐头盒。
data.Sentence: and the ground was covered with pieces of paper, cigarette ends, old tyres, empty bottles and rusty tins.

data.Sentence_cn: 在垃圾堆中我发现了一块牌子，上面写着：
data.Sentence: Among the rubbish, I found a sign which said,

data.Sentence_cn: “凡在此树林里丢弃垃圾者，将依法处置。” ---制作人:lintelite
data.Sentence: 'Anyone who leaves litter in these woods will be prosecuted!'
